website_summaries.verdict: The Huawei Fit is a capable fitness smartwatch, but the software falls short of the competition.
pros: The Huawei Fit is lightweight, comfortable to wear, and has week-long battery life
It can track daily activities, including heart rate, and can show notifications from your phone
It can be worn in the shower and while swimming
cons: The display is dull and touchscreen is difficult to operate when working out
There's no GPS or automatic exercise detection
The Huawei app lacks any sort of social features

customer_reviews.title: Frozen Screen
customer_reviews.text: This item was pretty good for the first 8 months, but then it stopped pairing to my iphone. Now it is stuck on one screen and will not allow me to use it. I have emailed the manufacturer because it clearly states that there is a year warranty, but the manufacturer has failed to respond to me. I have also contacted amazon, they will not do anything for me either. In addition, the screen quality has always been slightly fuzzy and not very hi-quality looking. The case of the watch is easily damageable and the paint chips off after a few months
customer_reviews.author: Tkgates

customer_reviews.title: Can't download extrawatch faces, only have 6
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work well with Android devices, Mine had issue at first to setup with android device but works well with iOS devices. Bluetooth keep loosing connection from time to time. Can't download extra watch faces, only have 6. Touch is Ok. Battery life is better then other smart watches in this price range. Works well with iPhone and apple health app. Heart Rate monitoring is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Pooja

customer_reviews.title: Great SemiSmart Watch
customer_reviews.text: After my Fitbit died in 15 months I looked around for a watch with heart rate monitoring as I have an ICD implanted in my chest. The price was right. I call it a semi smart watch as it has basic features but not all the bells and whistles. The best part is that it only needs to be charged once a week!! The only criticism is that switching between an iPad and Android watch requires unsparing from the iPad before linking to the android phone.
customer_reviews.author: AZOldGuy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device - does exactly what a simple smartwatch should
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this watch because I wanted the following: - Heart rate monitor - Long battery life - Always-on display - Alerts displayed from iphone - Elegant unobtrusive design - Waterproof This watch has met all these criteria and more. The design is surprisingly stylish, all notifications shown on the iphone are transferred to the watch, and health data is seamlessly transferred into Apple Health. The Huawei Fit is so simple that it will continue as my watch of choice for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Erik E Kraayenhof

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It worked all good for the first month. Then it started giving me problems like unresponsive display, wrong heart rate often etc., When the display is frozen, I had no option other than to keep it until the battery run out. It was out of the return eligible window by that time so had no option but to keep it. After another month, started showing me the wrong time. Then I have decided to stop using it. The app is a disaster. When ever I open the app it shows "Not Connected", trying to reconnect takes for ever and fail most of the time. Only good I felt was that it looks good... Nothing else worked for me... Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Ravindran

customer_reviews.title: This fitness watch is not user friendly at all
customer_reviews.text: I can not possibly recommend this watch at all, it's user interface is severely limited and not user friendly at all, it's capabilities are severely limited compared to competitors (fitbit or garmin) I would not ever buy this device again
customer_reviews.author: Per Wiatrow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smart watch for fitness monitor
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much I can receive the mobile call ringing and message notifications, I charge it every week after 7 days of continuous using, it's very high quality, really durable, a great reminder to start an activity after a period of setting down, it can set 7 alarm, monitor your sleeping timing and quality, heart rate measuring, and water resistance up to 30 meters, it's cheap compared to other brands with same functions. Thanks Huawei!
customer_reviews.author: Belal

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's safe to use
customer_reviews.text: With all the talk about cyber security, I stopped using this watch. My biggest complaints were that it's nice to see if you have a text or email, but you have to take your phone out to answer, and while using GPS you can't view the watch mode
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential for training.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Does everything I want. Great price too. I love the Huawei TRU-Sleep function which tells you how much sleep you've had and of what quality. The only thing that lets it down is that its primarily cardio sports based. (Running, Treadmill, Swimming, Cycling and Walking I believe). Would've been good if they included some resistance training modes. But its a great watch nonetheless. I also love how it displays the heart rate, and for me personally, helps me to stay in the fat burning heart rate zone so I don't burn muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not pair with OS
customer_reviews.text: Could not get it to pair with my OnePlus 6. The Huawei app would pair but loose connection... But the OS would not show it as a paired device, meaning I could not use smart Lock which I depend on.... So never got pass the set up stage. Unfortunate as I am looking for an always on display watch that I love as much as my pebble R.I.P

When I set that up, as soon as I put the watch on, it paired with the device, no problems. The HRM is spot on and wonderful - the reason I got this model. It also keeps track of running/walking, cycling, swimming, etc. Multiple modes - this thing has all I want and need!

customer_reviews.title: Nice heart and sleep monitor
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch for tracking the sleep patterns and also the heart monitor along with the tracking of the steps you take. I just wish that it tracks stair climbing it does show a stair climbing logo but I can't activate the feature and you can't edit the app if you need to adjust the steps you take. customer_reviews.title: Phone required!
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like the thing but it has some huge drawbacks. In order to use it you must have it connected to a smart phone and never get out of blue tooth range. It will also not pair with a tablet, it must be a phone. I am actually not able to use it because I don't use a smart phone. The watch will not work unless it is paired with a phone using either apple or android software. It will not pair with an iPad, I tried. It must be a phone and will not work unless connected to one.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light and very comfortable with some of the best sensors of any smart watch I have ever owned meaning the accuracy of steps, heart rate, exercising in general and the sleep data are second to none. Build quality is excellent just like my Mate 10 Pro and really everything Huawei makes. The reason I dropped 1 star is because the screen sensitivity makes it awkward to navigate from one screen to another. I have about 8 smart watches and always find myself going back to my Pebble 2HR which for me is the ideal smart watch.

customer_reviews.title: Love it but sleep tracker won't work
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, functions but can't get the sleep tracker to work. Any tips? May have to return. UPDATE 1: I contacted Huawei by phone, they were very helpful. Thank you. I tried their suggestions but sleep tracker still not working. I ended up returning and purchasing another brand new one this time. I uninstalled both wear and health apps then booted up watch. We will see tonight if it works. UPDATE 2: Sleep tracker didn't work again last night. Will reset and try on other wrist. Disappointing! UPDATE 3: Returning watch sleep tracker still not working.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: meh...
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is good, but that is the only nice thing I have to say about it. It is not a full wearOS device. It uses its own proprietary OS and interface with your phone, and it's not intuitive in its use. I would return this if the return window wasn't closed. I'm also concerned with the global espionage issues Huawei is facing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Fitness Tracker
customer_reviews.text: The Huawei watch has the average bells and whistles that you would find on a fitness watch (heart rate monitor, pedometer, flight counter, sleep monitor). It's no fitbit but if you can't afford the more flashy fitness trackers then this very well could be the one for you. The battery is EXCELLENT and lasts 6 days for me. I would absolutely recommend this fitness watch to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Ced

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HONOR WARRANTY
customer_reviews.text: The fit I bought had a malfunction within the time of being under warranty. This was proven to the customer service rep and he still refused to honor the warranty. The product is amazing, but don't think I will ever buy anything from this company again.

product_meta.title: Huawei Fit Smart Fitness Watch Heart Rate and Sleep Monitor Water Resistant Activity Tracker, Black Sport Band, Large
product_meta.description: Color:Titanium grey with black sport bandHuawei fit is an all-in-one sports activity tracker, including sleep monitor, Heart rate monitor, notification display, and more. The perfect combination of sports, fashion, and intelligent design, Huawei fit will provide valuable health related information for you to better understand your body and health condition. Huawei fit features the following with the use of Huawei wear app: 1. Personal training experience, such as customized running plan with real-time running guidance and training effect analysis; 2. Heart rate monitoring, including all-day Periodic monitoring and real-time Heart rate monitoring during workout; 3. 5ATM Water-Resistance suitable for pool swimming; 4. Multi-sport modes for Multiple forms of exercises (walking, running, cycling, treadmill) supporting Multiple goals of running (distance, calories, time, fat burning, endurance); 5. Tracking and monitoring of daily activity information, including step count, calories burned, and distance covered; 6. Automatic detection of Sleeping State with Statistics; 7. Alarm notification displays, including smart alarms and event alarms; 8. Notifications Supported include call, SMS, email, calendar, and other social media apps. The strap is easily removable and customizable; the strap included with purchase is made of TPU. The body of the wearable device and the strap have undergone strict allergy testing; controls for hazardous and toxic substances are in accordance with European Union standards.
feature_bullets: Personal training experience: customize your running plan with first be at, receive real-time running guidance, and analyze the effects of your training
Heart rate monitoring: single measurements, all-day periodic background measurement, and real-time heart rate monitoring during workout
Multi-sport modes and 5ATM water-resistance: supports multiple forms of exercise, including walking, running, cycling, and treadmill.
Daily activity tracking: tracks and monitors daily activity information, including step count, calories burned, and distance covered; automatically detects your sleeping State and gathers statistics.
Smart notifications: incoming call notifications, message notifications, smart alarms, and inactivity reminders
